title: Create a font in OSX
content:
Hi, I write from Italy.   
Can you help me to find a sotware to create a font in OSX ambient? I have some vectorial eps too, but I can't reach a esult with Fontgrapher.   
   
Thankyou and sorry for my english... ;-)
author: zack

comments.content: I think you should use fontlab ( [www.fontlab.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019074558/http:/www.fontlab.com/))

FontLab is probably best. You could use TypeTool, though it would be more difficult. If you are okay with Unix and X11 and have Developer Tools in installed on OS X there's FontForge ( [http://fontforge.sourceforge.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019074558/http:/fontforge.sourceforge.net/)).

Thankyou very very mutch.   
Now I'm trying FontLab and it do what I need.   
Thankyou, grazie! ;-)   
   
Zack
